Articles.Content:
Anyone got any suggestions on what mods I would need to do the following:

I want KSP to be as visually appealing as possible, not just from orbit but ground level.

AS realistic as possible in the case of life support food etc.

the possibility to survey planets while in orbit

make unmaned rovers with arms etc

and can someone who has gotten the intersteller warp drive to work show me their setup, everytime i try to warp i get not enough MW power warning

needs to work with current version of kerbal.

Infernal Robotics, SVE, TAC Life Support, FAR, SCANSat.

None work in 1.1 (which is the current version) AFAIK.

Stock Visual Enhancements totally does work in 1.1. As does Scatterer (with the usual caveat about the latter being a work in progress). SCANsat should also work, considering it ran fine in the prerelease.
